Aussie Holidays Application
===========================
Setup
-----
After deploying App (Unzipping), run OneTimeSetup.bat


Pre-execution
-------------
Edit and create a Aussie Holidays file for a specific year in the \bin directory.

A sample file is provided in \bin directory called AussieHolidaysBase.xml

File naming is strict.
Follow this pattern, AussieHolidays<yyyy>.xml where <yyyy> are year numbers 2022, 2023, etc.


Execution
---------
Run CallAussieHolidaysApplication.bat
You will be prompted for a year number. Again, 2022, 2023, etc.

The reports will be available in the \out directory.
